Produced in partnership with Patrón Tequila.By Amanda ShapiroFebruary 22, 20214.0(7)Read ReviewsTriangleEmailPinterestPrintPhoto by Chelsie CraigEmailPinterestPrintEmailPinterestPrintIngredientsCocktail:1½oz. Patrón Reposado Tequila1tsp. agave nectar½oz. lime juice½oz. blood orange juice½tsp. vanilla extractRim/Garnish:½tsp. flaky salt½tsp. sugar¼tsp. cinnamon¼tsp. chileOPTIONAL: cinnamon stick, star anise pods, and/or blood orange slice (for garnish)PreparationPreparationStep 1Combine the sugar, salt, chile, and cinnamon on a small plate. Rub rim of an old-fashioned or rocks glass with lime half; dip in spice mixture. Fill with ice and set aside.Step 2Combine 1½ oz. of Patrón Reposado Tequila, lime juice, blood orange juice, vanilla extract, and agave nectar in a cocktail shaker. Fill shaker with ice, cover, and shake vigorously for about 20 seconds.Step 3Strain margarita through a strainer or a mesh sieve into reserved glass. Garnish with cinnamon stick, star anise pod, and/or blood orange slice.How would you rate Winter Spiced Margarita?Leave a ReviewTell us what you thinkRecipes you want to make.
